abstract: “The Last Tycoons” is an insider’s history of Lazard Freres & Company, where William D. Cohan worked for six years as an investment banker.
snippet: “The Last Tycoons” is an insider’s history of Lazard Freres & Company, where William D. Cohan worked for six years as an investment banker.
lead_paragraph: A book written by William D. Cohan, a New York journalist who went to work on Wall Street, won the Financial Times and Goldman Sachs Business Book of the Year Award yesterday.

headline.main: Lazard History Wins Industry Book Prize
